post.body:
My smartphone continues to be a target for scam calls this Christmas. I get around 10-20 a day now. All use number-spoofers, and can't be blocked.

So I did what I do best. I put a credit card photo on a website! Except, you have to wait 30 minutes before you can see it. And install an addon. And pray that your smartphone / PC doesn't crash.. while you wait .. as this script is written with complete disregard of the viewer's CPU usage..!

Every binary options peddler who dares to call me for a deposit, will be referred to this link.
